com.github.peterbencze.serritor.api.web.socket

Interface WebSocketHandler


  • public interface WebSocketHandler
    Common interface of the WebSocket endpoint handlers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void onClose(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session, int statusCode, String reason)
      Called when a client disconnects.
      default void onConnect(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session)
      Called when a client connects.
      default void onError(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session, Throwable cause)
      Called when a WebSocket error occurs.
      default void onMessage(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session, byte[] payload, int offset, int length)
      Called when a client sends a binary message.
      default void onMessage(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session, String message)
      Called when a client sends a text message.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnect

        default void onConnect(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session)
                throws IOException
        Called when a client connects.
        Parameters:
        session - the WebSocket session
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs in the handler

      • onMessage

        default void onMessage(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session,
                       String message)
                throws IOException
        Called when a client sends a text message.
        Parameters:
        session - the WebSocket session
        message - the message
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs in the handler

      • onMessage

        default void onMessage(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session,
                       byte[] payload,
                       int offset,
                       int length)
                throws IOException
        Called when a client sends a binary message.
        Parameters:
        session - the WebSocket session
        payload - the raw payload array
        offset - the offset in the payload array where the data starts
        length - the length of bytes in the payload
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs in the handler

      • onClose

        default void onClose(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session,
                     int statusCode,
                     String reason)
              throws IOException
        Called when a client disconnects.
        Parameters:
        session - the WebSocket session
        statusCode - the close status code
        reason - the optional reason for the close
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs in the handler

      • onError

        default void onError(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session,
                     Throwable cause)
              throws IOException
        Called when a WebSocket error occurs.
        Parameters:
        session - the WebSocket session
        cause - the cause of the error
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs in the handler
